definition: even heroes have a weakness for the charms of a beautiful woman (idiom)
pinyin: ying1 xiong2 nan2 guo4 mei3 ren2 guan1

definition: United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
male/staminate/grand/imposing/powerful/mighty/person or state having great power and influence
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
